long_description: The Thule Glide Stroller is a high-performance sports stroller with a lightweight aerodynamic design, allowing you to get the most out of your run on sidewalks and dirt paths. Fixed front wheel provides increased stability when moving at a fast pace. Extended multi-position handlebar provides a generous kick stride. Hand-activated front brake increases braking control on steep terrain. Features rear suspension for a smooth and comfortable ride. Padded seat with vented top reclines to a near flat position for on-the-go naps for your child. 1-handed compact folding design for storage and transport. The The Thule Glide Stroller features a multi-position canopy for added protection with a view-in roof port to see your child. Can be used with children ages 0 - 6 months when used with the Thule Car Seat Adapter (sold separately), with your child in the car seat and while strolling only.
short_description: The Thule Glide Stroller is a high-performance sports stroller with a lightweight aerodynamic design, allowing you to get the most out of your run on sidewalks and dirt paths.
